description: This file defines the IEventHandler interface within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, declaring several virtual callback methods for handling different event types related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change events.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface class defining event handler callback methods for different event types.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when a runtime manager event occurs, passing event data as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when a window manager event occurs, passing event data as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked on ripple events, with the event name and associated data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when a state change event occurs, passing event data as a JsonObject.
